net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractValidator, CompositeValidator, DoubleEntryValidator, DoubleRangeValidator, DoubleValidator, EmailValidator, FloatValidator, IntegerValidator, LongRangeValidator, LongValidator, NumberValidator, PassAllValidator, RegularExpressionValidator, RequiredLocalizationValidator, RequiredValueValidator, StringValueValidator, ValidMarkupValidator, ValidRegularExpressionValidator, ValidURIValidator, ValidURLValidator, XMLFragmentMIWTValidator

    public interface Validator
    Defines data validation for a component.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isComponentValidationSupported(Component component)
      Determine if this validator instance can be used with the given component.
      boolean validate(Component component, Notifiable notifiable)
      Validate the specified component.

    • Method Detail

      • isComponentValidationSupported

        boolean isComponentValidationSupported(Component component)
        Determine if this validator instance can be used with the given component.
        Parameters:
        component - The component.
        Returns:
        true if this validator supports the given component, otherwise false.

      • validate

        boolean validate(Component component,
               Notifiable notifiable)
        Validate the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to validate.
        notifiable - the notifiable to send notifications.
        Returns:
        true if the component data is valid, otherwise false.
